text: Her swytelað on þissum gewritæ þæt Stigand Bisceop and sæ hiræð on ealdan mynstræ lætan to Æþælmære ane hidæ landæs æt Spæresholte his dæg and Sæmannes dæg his suna wyð swylcan sceattæ swylcæ he hit þa findon mihte.
Þyses is to gewitnæssæ, Stigand bisceop and sæ hireð on ealdan mynstræ and Ælfwinæ abbod and sæ hireð on niwan mynstræ and eallæ scyrþægenas on Hamtunsciræ.
Þissa gewrita syndan twa, an is on ealdan mynstræ and oþær hæfð Æþelmær.
